TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ICustomTypeDescriptor

summary.span: 提供为对象提供动态自定义类型信息的接口。

span.span: Provides an interface that supplies dynamic custom type information for an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口允许对象提供有关其自身的类型信息。The interface allows an object to provide type information about itself. 通常情况下，当对象需要动态类型信息时使用此接口。Typically, this interface is used when an object needs dynamic type information. 与此相反，类提供了从元数据获得的静态类型信息。In contrast, the class provides static type information that is obtained from metadata. 例如，中使用[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]提供 COM 对象的类型信息。For example, is used in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] to provide type information for COM objects. COM 对象不支持属性或特性。COM objects do not support properties or attributes. 因此，[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]使用实现属性和 COM 对象的属性。Therefore, the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] uses to implement properties and attributes for COM objects. 若要提供动态自定义类型的信息，一个类可以实现或派生自类，该类提供此接口的简单实现。To provide dynamic custom type information, a class can implement or derive from the class, which provides a simple implementation of this interface. > [!NOTE] > 没有用于数据绑定到对象实现的设计时支持接口。There is no design-time support for data binding to objects that implement the interface. 此外，当绑定到的运行时实例，基础类型的公共属性将被忽略。In addition, when binding to a runtime instance of , the public properties of the underlying type are ignored.

span.span: Type Descriptor Overview

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.ComponentModel.AttributeCollection GetAttributes() cil managed

summary.span: 返回此组件实例的自定义属性的集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of custom attributes for this instance of a component.
An containing the attributes for this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回值决不会是`null`。The return value is never `null`. 实现器可以返回一个空如果没有自定义特性指定的对象。Implementers can return an empty if no custom attributes are specified for an object.

span.span: The class name of the object, or if the class does not have a name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`null`是返回，使用类型名称从方法。If `null` is returned, use the type name from the method.

span.span: The name of the object, or if the object does not have a name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`null`是返回，使用默认名称。If `null` is returned, use the default name.

summary.span: 返回此组件实例的事件。

span.span: Returns the events for this instance of a component.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection GetEvents() cil managed

summary.span: 返回此组件实例的事件。

span.span: Returns the events for this instance of a component.

returns.span: 表示此组件实例的事件的 。

span.span: An that represents the events for this component instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实例的事件可能不同于一组类提供的事件。The events for this instance can differ from the set of events that the class provides. 例如，如果组件是基于站点的该站点可以添加或删除其他事件。For example, if the component is site-based, the site can add or remove additional events. 实现者可以返回如果未不指定任何属性。Implementors can return if no properties are specified. 此方法应永远不会返回`null`。This method should never return `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection GetEvents(class System.Attribute[] attributes) cil managed
Public Function GetEvents (attributes As Attribute()) As EventDescriptorCollection

param.name: attributes
param.span: 用作筛选器的 类型数组。

span.span: An array of type that is used as a filter.

summary.span: 使用指定的属性数组作为筛选器，返回此组件实例的事件。

span.span: Returns the events for this instance of a component using the specified attribute array as a filter.

returns.span: 表示此组件实例的已筛选事件的 。

span.span: An that represents the filtered events for this component instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实例的事件可能不同于一组类提供的事件。The events for this instance can differ from the set of events that the class provides. 例如，如果组件是基于站点的该站点可以添加或删除其他事件。For example, if the component is site-based, the site can add or remove additional events. 如果中指定`attributes`数组和事件不具有该特性的类的实例，返回的数组包含该事件，如果是默认事件。If an is specified in the `attributes` array and the event does not have an instance of the class for that attribute, the returned array includes the event if the is the default event.

summary.span: 返回此组件实例的属性。

span.span: Returns the properties for this instance of a component.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection GetProperties() cil managed

summary.span: 返回此组件实例的属性。

span.span: Returns the properties for this instance of a component.

returns.span: 表示此组件实例的属性的 。

span.span: A that represents the properties for this component instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实例的属性可能不同于此类提供的属性集。The properties for this instance can differ from the set of properties that the class provides. 例如，如果组件所在的站点可以添加或删除其他属性。For example, if the component is sited, the site can add or remove additional properties. 实现器可以返回如果未不指定任何属性。Implementers can return if no properties are specified. 此方法应永远不会返回`null`。This method should never return `null`.

returns.span: 表示此组件实例的已筛选属性的 。

span.span: A that represents the filtered properties for this component instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实例的属性可能不同于此类提供的属性集。The properties for this instance can differ from the set of properties that the class provides. 例如，如果组件所在的站点可以添加或删除其他属性。For example, if the component is sited, the site can add or remove additional properties. 如果中指定`attributes`数组和属性不具有该特性的类的实例，则返回的集合会包含该属性，如果是默认属性。If an is specified in the `attributes` array and the property does not have an instance of the class for that attribute, the returned collection will include the property if the is the default property. 有关筛选规则，请参阅。For filtering rules, see .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetPropertyOwner(class System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor pd) cil managed
Public Function GetPropertyOwner (pd As PropertyDescriptor) As Object

param.name: pd
param.span: 表示要查找其所有者的属性的 。

span.span: A that represents the property whose owner is to be found.

summary.span: 返回一个对象，该对象包含指定的属性描述符所描述的属性。

span.span: Returns an object that contains the property described by the specified property descriptor.

returns.span: 表示指定属性所有者的 。

span.span: An that represents the owner of the specified property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法检索的对象，包含描述的属性成员参数。The method retrieves the object that contains the property member that is described by parameter. 通常情况下，此对象是必要条件和方法。Typically, this object is required for the and methods. 此方法应返回一个对象，您可以使用，如下所示：This method should return an object that you can use as follows: ``` pd.GetValue(GetPropertyOwner(myPd)); ``` 如果`myPd`是`null`，实现接口应返回的默认对象 （通常情况下，公开的属性和特性的基对象）。If `myPd` is `null`, your implementation of the interface should return the default object (typically, the base object that exposes the properties and attributes).
